page.title: 02LANDSCAPE CLAPHAM VILLAGE
page.content: When first you walk through Clapham in Spring and Summer you hear the birds'sweet tunes,the water crashing down the waterfall and you hear the swaying of the trees in the wind. The parish of Clapham has 500 inhabitants,but the village itself has only \ of that number.Although Clapham is in a limestone area most of the houses are faced with sandstone. There are 4 shops,the post office,the dairy,the pottery,and the grocers shop.In addition there is a Mercedes garage,the Dalesman Publishing company a sawmill, also there is an Agricultural garage,and 2 cafes, and an hotel. In the middle of the village is a car park with an Infomation Centre.There are 2 places of worship;the church of Saint James,and the new Bethel Chapel.
